Name: Fibber McGee
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Delicately flavoured, bittersweet grapefruit and sweet vermouth fortified with gin.
History: Adapted from a recipe in David A. Embury 's 1948 The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks .
Nutrition: One serving of Fibber McGee contains 147 calories
